# swift2 - Python package

> Bindings to access the SWIFT2 libraries, from Python.

Python package for ensemble streamflow forecasting. It can equally be used in non-ensemble simulation mode for other, “traditional” semi-distributed hydrologic modelling.

## API documentation

- [classes](https://csiro-hydroinformatics.github.io/swift-py-doc/classes/index.md)
- [common](https://csiro-hydroinformatics.github.io/swift-py-doc/common/index.md)
- [const](https://csiro-hydroinformatics.github.io/swift-py-doc/const/index.md)
- [doc_helper](https://csiro-hydroinformatics.github.io/swift-py-doc/doc_helper/index.md)
- [helpers](https://csiro-hydroinformatics.github.io/swift-py-doc/helpers/index.md)
- [internal](https://csiro-hydroinformatics.github.io/swift-py-doc/internal/index.md)
- [model_definitions](https://csiro-hydroinformatics.github.io/swift-py-doc/model_definitions/index.md)
